title.bibl: Die Abendpost, March 28th, 1894. Music Director M. Nevens Dead.

div.bibl: Die Abendpost, March 28th, 1894. Music Director M. Nevens Dead.

body.p: M. Nevens, one of the most noted German-American musicians, died yesterday at his home, 634 Walnut Street, 76 years old. He was born in Brooklyn and came in his younger years to Chicago, where he studied to be a musician and soon became a capable orchestra-leader.
He took part in the war with Mexico and also was a volunteer soldier during the Civil war on the Northern side. He is survived by a widow and three children
